subject: How to start
author: Carol B.
full_text:
Hi all,

I've been reading all the posts for the last couple days....I'm a little
afraid to ask but here goes....I'm experienced with evp...but know nothing
about the radio shack hack....could someone tell me step by step how to
have a session?  I'm intrigued and really want to start delving into all
of this.

Thank you
Carol B.
